home.subheadline: Integrated production, storage, and dispensing infrastructure designed for warehouse logistics and heavy transport.

technology.title: Hydrogen Approach
technology.p1: Traditional hydrogen logistics suffer from high transport costs and energy loss. Rockwell H2 eliminates these variables by housing the entire production loop within a site-integrated footprint.
technology.p2: Our PowerPods bridge the gap between intermittent renewable power and mission-critical work.

generic.solutionsBody: Rockwell H2 provides turnkey solutions for Port Logistics, Warehousing, and Remote Microgrids. Each deployment includes our modular PowerPod hardware cluster managed by an integrated software monitoring layer.
generic.companyBody: Founded on the principle of industrial resilience, Rockwell H2 Systems engineers the hardware necessary to decarbonize the global supply chain. We focus on mid-stream infrastructure that bridges renewable generation with heavy-duty consumption.
generic.contactBody: Select your inquiry path to be connected with our regional engineering or investment teams. We maintain response times under 48 hours for institutional partners.
generic.safetyBody: Safety is our fundamental engineering constraint. Rockwell H2 pods are NFPA 2 and ASME B31.12 compliant, featuring triple-redundant pressure relief and automated leak mitigation systems.
generic.taxBody: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) provides significant production tax credits for clean hydrogen. Rockwell H2 pods are engineered to qualify for the highest tiers ($3.00/kg) by utilizing site-integrated renewable assets.
